sentences.sContent: The print is a hortative drawing. It tells us that everybody has shortcoming and the power of the individual is smaller than group.
sentences.sContent_eng: The print is a hortative drawing. It tells us that everybody has shortcoming and the power of the individual is smaller than group.
sentences.sCn: 这幅图片是一张勉励的漫画，他告诉我们每个人都有缺点，一个人的力量总是不如集体的力量的。

trans.tranCn: 劝告的, 鼓励的, 忠告的, 奖励的
